posts.title: Can't switch my brain off
posts.body: Couldn't fall asleep until almost 3am again. My chest felt tight all evening after that comment from my manager. I keep replaying it in my head. I know it probably wasn't a big deal but my body reacts like it's a crisis. I feel restless and on edge. I skipped dinner because I just didn't feel hungry.
posts.text: Can't switch my brain off Couldn't fall asleep until almost 3am again. My chest felt tight all evening after that comment from my manager. I keep replaying it in my head. I know it probably wasn't a big deal but my body reacts like it's a crisis. I feel restless and on edge. I skipped dinner because I just didn't feel hungry.

posts.title: Everything feels heavy
posts.body: I didn't leave the house today. Ignored messages from friends because I didn't have the energy to reply. I keep thinking I'm falling behind in life. It's not that I want to die, but sometimes I wish I could just pause everything. I feel exhausted even though I haven't done much.
posts.text: Everything feels heavy I didn't leave the house today. Ignored messages from friends because I didn't have the energy to reply. I keep thinking I'm falling behind in life. It's not that I want to die, but sometimes I wish I could just pause everything. I feel exhausted even though I haven't done much.

posts.title: Small ups and sudden drops
posts.body: This morning I felt almost normal for a few hours. I managed to work a bit. By late afternoon it dropped again. I felt empty and detached. Sleep is getting worse and food doesn't taste like anything. I worry something is wrong with me. I just want stability.
